trans-unit.source: Alternatively, GCodeUtils can be run directly from sources after a git pull:
trans-unit.target: 另外,GCodeUtils也可以在git pull后直接从源头运行。

trans-unit.source: Currently, it is composed of one calibration generation program, a basic gcode modifier (which translates code along X/Y or convert extrusion distance to relative), a stretcher to increase hole size of printed parts and a GCode converter which generate arc opcodes from arc interpolation as segments.
trans-unit.target: 目前,它由一个校准生成程序、一个基本的gcode修改器(将代码沿X/Y方向转换或将挤出距离转换为相对值)、一个用于增加印刷件孔径的拉伸器和一个将弧形插值作为段生成弧形码的GCode转换器组成。

trans-unit.source: GCode parsing is borrowed from GCoder as found in Printrun (https://github.com/kliment/Printrun)
GCodeUtils is a set of utilities to manipulate GCode programs. It is targetting RepRap oriented GCode but isn’t limited to RepRap.
trans-unit.target: GCodeUtils是一组用于操纵GCode程序的实用程序。它针对的是面向RepRap的GCode，但不仅限于RepRap。

trans-unit.source: GCodeUtils is installable from PyPI with a single pip command:
trans-unit.target: GCodeUtils可以通过一个pip命令从PyPI安装。

trans-unit.source: Latest documentation can be found online at this address: http://gcodeutils.readthedocs.org/en/latest/
trans-unit.target: 可以在以下地址在线找到最新文档：http : //gcodeutils.readthedocs.org/en/latest/

trans-unit.source: Once GCodeUtils is installed, the .py files located in the cura_plugins subdirectory can be copied into the plugins directory of Cura to be callable from within Cura itself.
trans-unit.target: 一旦安装了GCodeUtils，就可以将位于cura_plugins子目录中的.py文件复制到Cura的plugins目录中，以便可以从Cura本身进行调用。

trans-unit.source: or directly from its git repository:
trans-unit.target: 或直接从其git仓库中获取。
